description: CryptoNinja is the largest Web3-style character IP in Japan, managed by NinjaDAO, which was founded by Japanese influencer Ikehaya in September 2021. As of June 2023, there are 36 Ninjas, and the signature Ethereum collection, CryptoNinja Partners (CNP), has the highest market cap in Japan, exceeding 12k ETH. CryptoNinja Ordinals (CNO) is an Ordinals collection of CryptoNinja with 1,000 inscriptions, planned to be increased to 2,222 in the future. CNO aims to become the leading Ordinals collection not just in Japan, but across the world.
name: CryptoNinja Ordinals
